title: Did President Trump Profit from the U.S. Missile Strike Against Syria?
subtitle: Online reports claimed that President Trump owns stock in Raytheon and thereby profited from a U.S. Tomahawk missile strike on a Syrian airbase in April 2017.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Trump owns stock in Raytheon and directly profited from the use of their Tomahawk missiles in an April 2017 U.S. strike on a Syrian air base.
